ingredients.ingredient: 2 ounces goat cheese, or more to taste
1 ½ tablespoons mango chutney (such as Patak's®), or more to taste

cookingTips: Spread goat cheese evenly on bread before adding chutney
Butter the outside of bread for golden, crispy results
Grill over medium heat to prevent burning while cheese melts
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user balance the tangy goat cheese with sweet mango chutney and achieve optimal cheese melting.
